701486f-b.text:
Morris Park Avenue, north side, west from Wallace to Hunt Avenues, showing the Roman Catholic Church of Our Lady of Solace. The church proper is at the the N. W. corner of Holland Avenue and adjoining it on the west is the parish house (views 2,3). Two units of the parochial school are at the N. E. corner of Holland Avenue.

June 22, 1940
Views 1,2,3
P. L. Sperr
701486f-b.folder: Morris Park Avenue & Wallace Avenue, Bronx, NY
701486f-b.original_title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Wallace Avenue
